Topology (sub) classes

MGTopology is top abstract class for MGBVertex, MGPVertex, MGEdge, MGLoop, MGFace, MGShell. More...

Detailed Description

MGTopology is top abstract class for MGBVertex, MGPVertex, MGEdge, MGLoop, MGFace, MGShell.

MGDECL MGPosition MGClosest_to_curves ( const MGPosition &  uv,
const MGPvector< MGCurve > &  curves 
)

Obtain the closest point from point uv to vector of curves.

MGClosest_to_curves does not change wc_zero, and so calling program of MGClosest_to_curves should change it if necessary.

Parameters:
uv Point.
curves vector of curves.
